about_the_game:
8bit hi-tempo BGM pack is an RPG Maker official audio collection of background music. These track have been done with the 2a03 soundchip, which is the soundchip of the FamiCom. It goes well within games in pixel art style. As the name suggests, these tracks in the pack are hi-tempo and have an immense sense of tension. It's best to use them in battle scenes or in moments full of action.

■ 16 tracks crafted with love!
For a full description of what you can expect, refer to the tracklist below!

-----------------------------------------------------------------------

・BGM (15 tracks)
・ ME (1 tracks)

1. Adrenaline Rush
2. Another Victory
3. Battle For Wonderland
4. Boss Vanquished
5. Depths
6. 6. Jingle - Mission Cleared!
7. Like a Gladiator
8. Make a Decision
9. Mighty Foe
10. Miko Style
11. Neverending Eruption
12. Para Bellum
13. Smith
14. The Path of the Shrine Maiden
15. Tower of Light
16. You Have to Fight

-----------------------------------------------------------------------

・This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
・OK to be used in Commercial projects made in RPG Maker
・Rights must be indicated when using assets.
・You may modify some of the assets (but not redistribute them) for your own game use only.
・All copyrights, neighboring rights, and all other rights to this material belong to the creator or a third party authorized by the creator.
